Package com.centurylink.mdw.monitor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ActivityMonitor
    Activity monitors can be registered through @Monitor annotations to get (optionally) called whenever an MDW workflow activity is invoked.
    AdapterMonitor
    AdapterMonitors can be registered through @Monitor annotations to intercept external service calls originating from MDW workflow adapter activities.
    Monitor  
    OfflineMonitor<T extends RuntimeContext>
    Indicates that a monitor should be run in a separate thread so as not to bog down mainstream workflow processing.
    ProcessMonitor
    Process monitors can be registered through @Monitor annotations to get notified during the lifecycle of an MDW workflow process.
    ServiceMonitor
    ServiceMonitors can be registered through @Monitor annotations to intercept service calls handled by the MDW framework.
    TaskMonitor
    Activity monitors can be registered through @Monitor annotations to get (optionally) called whenever an MDW workflow activity is invoked.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    MonitorAttributes  
    MonitorRegistry
    Registry for MDW monitoring services.
